cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20.0)

# Infuse-IoT application
if(NOT infuse IN_LIST SNIPPET)
  set(SNIPPET infuse ${SNIPPET} CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
endif()

find_package(Zephyr REQUIRED HINTS $ENV{ZEPHYR_BASE})
project(application_states)

# Use the extended definitions generated by `west cloudgen`
# To regenerate:
#   cd infuse-sdk/tests/subsys/definitions_extend/
#   west cloudgen -d ./extensions -o .
zephyr_include_directories(generated/include)
# Compile in the extended RPC commands
zephyr_sources(generated/rpc_command_runner.c)

target_sources(app PRIVATE
  src/main.c
)
